```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(tinytable)
```

```{r}
messy <- readr::read_delim("../data/Messy_Penguins.csv",delim=";")%>% 
  janitor::clean_names(case="snake")

```

```{r}
messy_modified <- messy %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(across(where(is.character),as.factor)) %>%
  dplyr::relocate(where(is.factor))

messy_modified
```

```{r}
tt(messy_modified)
```

```{r}
messy_modified <- messy %>% tidyr::drop_na()
messy_modified
```

```{r}
tt(messy_modified)
```
